WorkItem.ClosedComment: This is by design. Item cache in 2.2 will not be compatible with older versions. Glyphs also won't be loaded from old character files.
WorkItem.Description: When loading this character file, Embrace of the Spider and Sundial of the Exiled will only show (and contribute) their baseline spellpower/crit values. Only clicking "update from armory" on them will add the on-proc component for display and calculation purposes, *even though the procs were already listed in their item properties*. This issue is not present in release 220b6.
WorkItem.Summary: ItemCache items (with procs?) improperly loaded in ver.32991 (and prior)

Comments.Message: Glyphs also don't look like they are properly loaded.
